name: Another Quest Another Kingdom
description:
Wizard that mastered the dog magics, or Knight that spins till he wins, under your command one of this brave adventurers will slay the wretched Goose Hydra and free this land from terror!

This game was created in order participate in Game Lynch on DevGAMM Moscow 2017, the show itself on Game Lynch you must protect you game on a stage against industry veterans, our game designer went against Chris Taylor, creator of Total Annihilation
